mapper.insert: INSERT INTO myPageInfo(myPageId, memberId, title, introduce, closed) VALUES (#{myPageId}, #{memberId}, #{title}, #{introduce}, #{closed})
mapper.select: SELECT myPageId, memberId, title, introduce, visitorCount, created, closed from myPageInfo where memberId = #{memberId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO myPageProfile(myPageId, userName, isUserName, city, isCity, gender, isGender, hobby, isHobby) VALUES (#{myPageId}, #{userName}, #{isUserName}, #{city}, #{isCity}, #{gender}, #{isGender}, #{hobby, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isHobby})
mapper.update: update member2 set profilePhoto=#{profilePhoto, jdbcType=VARCHAR} where memberId=#{memberId}
mapper.select: SELECT b.myPageId, b.memberId,title, introduce, visitorCount, created, profilePhoto,userName, isUserName, city ,isCity, gender, isGender, hobby, isHobby FROM myPageInfo b join myPageProfile p on b.myPageId=p.myPageId join member2 m on b.memberId=m.memberId WHERE b.myPageId=#{value}
mapper.update: UPDATE myPageInfo SET visitorCount=visitorCount+1 WHERE myPageId=#{myPageId}
